name: Shopping List
description: Making sure you have enough Mana Orbs.

shopping-list-no-garage-button.name: Garage Button
shopping-list-no-garage-button.description: If you want the Mod button in the Icon Kit (Garage). When disabled, you can only interact with the Info button located in the Shops.

shopping-list-disable-checkmark.name: Remove Checkmark
shopping-list-disable-checkmark.description: Icons aren't greyed out and displayed without checkmark. If you want to see the designs.

experimental-segment.name: Experimental features
experimental-segment.description: This section is for features that are in active development.

show-paths.name: Display Paths
show-paths.description: Adds a sixth page that goes for the <cy>Paths of Power</c>
